column4: I'm having a little problem, i've got a 'nwc' file, it's a music file but i can't find any program wich can play it (mplayer, amarok). Anybody got a suggestion how i can listen to this file pls ?
what format is it? i've never heard of nwc...
well, that explains nwc at least :-)
i'm having exact the same problem, it's for my grandmother, she told me that people with windows can play it
